name: SUKEBE BLOCKS
description:
◆ Caution
All characters in this work are over 18 years old.


◆ This is a traditional Japanese hentai game called "DATSUI BLOCK-KUZUSHI".
It is a genre of hentai games with deep memories for Japanese people who have spent the 2000s with the Internet.
Play with anime beauties drawn with nostalgic pixel art!




◆ A fast-paced, casual BREAKOUT game.
In this game, you will be able to break down the clothes of a beautiful anime girl instead of blocks.



Once all the blocks are broken, a differential hentai image will be added from the select menu!




◆ How to Play
You can play with mouse only.
Left click: Confirm, Shoot (in game, at start of round), Bomb (in game, after shooting)



Right-click: Back, Pause, Menu (in game)




◆ High Score Tips
The most important point is not to make mistakes.
Use the left-click bomb to break the blocks at once and clear them quickly!




◆ Play time
It takes about 20-30 minutes to complete all the levels.
